hero_subtitle: Celebrate the Beginning of Your Journey with Us!
about_event: Join us for Freshers Feista 2025, an exciting event designed to welcome new students and help them connect with peers, explore campus life, and kickstart their college journey with fun activities, games, and social events.
requirements: ✅ Payment must be verified; no proxy or fake transactions allowed.
